about.title: About us
about.content1: We are UE PDL Group 6. Here is our site respecting the specifications that the client gave us where you can admire images in a magnificent gallery.
about.content2: You can also add and remove images to make this gallery more personal!
about.content3: By clicking on the selected image, you can see the details of the image and apply a large number of effects to it!
about.content4: To save your new image, download it! And if you don't like it, try another effect or remove it!
about.content5: All that remains is to admire your magnificent gallery!
about.content6: From the developers of PACA - PDL Alex Pepi Amandine Semeteys Charles Goedefroit -

uploadImage.title: Upload an image
